channel.title: Words above npc head

item.title: Words above npc head
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

i am wondering how can i make words above my npc head like hes talking, im on delta and here is my code but this doesnt work

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2698) { if (misc.random2(1) <= 2) { npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[NPCID].textUpdate = "Beginner Training Teleport!"; } }

Read full topic
